# Sigenergy with Home Assistant and EMHASS + Amber Electric

This guide is automatically published to: [https://sigenergy.annable.me](https://sigenergy.annable.me)

## Tech Stack

This site is built with [Astro](https://astro.build/) and deployed to GitHub Pages.

## Local development

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

## Build

```bash
npm run build
```

The built site will be in the `dist/` directory.

## Deployment

The site automatically deploys to GitHub Pages when changes are pushed to the main branch via GitHub Actions.
